name: C'iel, Creator of Shadows // Gaira, Catalyst of Light
text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to white and green is less than seven, C'iel, Creator of Shadows isn't a creature.
Enchantments you control are creatures in addition to their other types, and have power and toughness equal to their mana value.
Whenever another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, gain life equal to its mana value.
